Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory136.png'}
{3: 'Commandants Gala, Vanderbilt Holiday Hotel, Babylonia. 3:30 pm.'}
{3: 'A rainbow of lights from the chandeliers glisten in the ballroom, the crisp tinkling of glasses and silverware ringing around the room. Laughter and toasts weave together into a festive waltz.'}
{3: 'The band performing on the stage is playing the newly recovered Golden Age single from Squared Circle last month. The ecstatic electronic music paints a romantic picture of a time long gone.'}

{3: 'Men and women dressed to the nines, delicacies served on silverplates, cocktails brimming with colors... The guests have been transposed to a strange fairy tale, leaving the war behind for a moment of respite.'}
{2: 'Nothing.', 3: '12', 4: "Bianca, you're getting a little too close...", 5: '14'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Is that so?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "The other commandants are all socializing. Why aren't you joining them?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: '...My mission is to make sure of your safety.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "But if you think it would affect your ability to socialize, then I'll keep my distance.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Maybe they've noticed how close you're standing...", 3: '17'}
{2: 'And they assume I already have company...', 3: '24'}
{2: 'That would be great. Thanks.', 3: '20', 4: "That's not what I meant!", 5: '20'}
{2: "It's just that, the way you've been following me..."}
{2: 'They might assume that I already have company.', 3: '24'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'm sorry.", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's fine. This is nice.", 3: '27', 4: "I'm happy to have you as my company if you're willing.", 5: '28'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'll be waiting for you at the door. Please let me know immediately if you need anything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'll pass. My job here is to keep you safe...", 4: '1'}
{2: "It doesn't have to be one way or the other.", 3: '41'}
{2: 'Are you leaving me behind?', 3: '34'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'm still nearby. I'm just guarding the door.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'No matter what happens, I will not leave you behind, Commandant. Your safety is my top priority.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I can always count on you, Bianca.', 3: '37', 4: 'I was just joking!', 5: '41'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'm just doing my job.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'But if you would join me at the ball...', 3: '39'}
{2: "It'll make me very happy...", 3: '41'}
{2: "This is Babylonia. No one's going to stab me in the back.", 3: '43', 4: "I'm the Gray Raven Commandant. I can protect myself.", 5: '43'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'But the mission I received was to guard you in all your public functions.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Isn't that just spying on me?!", 3: '45'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'The President was just worried about your safety.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "After all, Babylonia knows so little about Ascendants, and you're the only commandant who has had meaningful contact with them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sigh, fine.', 3: '48', 4: 'So are you just going to stand there the whole time?', 5: '48'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: '...If it makes you feel better if I do as you say?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Very well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'What do I do next?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just accompany me out there.', 3: '55', 4: 'Have you not been to a gala before, Bianca?', 5: '60'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Ah. Alright.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'm sorry. I've never been to an event with the objective to socialize.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why?', 3: '60', 4: 'Has the Purifying Force never hosted any parties?', 5: '60'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Constructs don't need to socialize.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Maybe some of my colleagues would have private gatherings, but as long as those don't interfere with their work, I wouldn't intervene.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Don't be so strict on yourself.", 3: '63', 4: 'Then let me show you a good time today!', 5: '63'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Thanks, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
